item.title: By: Wild Bill
item.dc:creator: Wild Bill
item.description: <p>Amazingly enough- my niece wanted one too. We ended up getting her a 2.4 gig, 15" TFT, CD-RW/DVD, 256mb ram and 40mb hard drive laptop, with XP bundled. How much ? £639 + VAT. An Acer Aspire 1310. And the cheapest way to get it was from the Acer website. Arrived the next day, and so far - dammed fast. (I've got a £4k Dell Inspiron - not easily swayed) . ---* Bill</p>
item.content:encoded: Amazingly enough- my niece wanted one too. We ended up getting her a 2.4 gig, 15″ TFT, CD-RW/DVD, 256mb ram and 40mb hard drive laptop, with XP bundled. How much ? £639 + VAT. An Acer Aspire 1310. And the cheapest way to get it was from the Acer website. Arrived the next day, and so far – dammed fast. (I’ve got a £4k Dell Inspiron – not easily swayed) . —* Bill

item.title: By: sarah
item.dc:creator: sarah
item.description: <p>just looking at your website with your mum after homemade icecream! really useful-mum and i are hopefully off to staples etc. tomorrow! thanks again-only 5days to go! s.</p>
item.content:encoded: just looking at your website with your mum after homemade icecream! really useful-mum and i are hopefully off to staples etc. tomorrow! thanks again-only 5days to go! s.

item.title: By: Mum
